column17:
Perfect Sagas Weighing Scale Price: Rs.680

Easy to power-up just lightly tap the scale Runs on 1 button cell Auto power off function and auto zero reading Easy to read large display sized 3 cm x 7.5 cm Diameter Super slim at 4 cm. high easily hide under the bed or slip it in the drawer Nice for personal use for gifts prize Weighing limits: Minimum - 7 Kg and Maximum - 150 kg
